name.zh_TW: RΞLAY - NFT 智能購買工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NFT evaluation, best deals, news, and more to help you buy NFTs better on the Ethereum blockchain
short.zh_TW: NFT 評估、最佳標的、新聞等功能，幫助你在以太坊區塊鏈上更好地購買 NFT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Become a savvy NFT trader with RΞLAY, an NFT smart shopping tool packed with an arsenal of features that levels up your NFT game. 

Here are some of the key features that lets you win at trading NFTs:

**NFT Project Stats**

Floor price is not the only indicator of an NFT project’s health and we’ve got you covered. Visualize floor, total listings, and number of sales fluctuations intuitively with flexible timeframes that offer data from 10 minutes to 14 days. These valuable insights seamlessly accompany you whenever you visit an NFT’s collection page so you can effortlessly stay informed on all these essential numbers.

**NFT Project Social Events**

Easily keep tabs on social events for NFT projects and see the connection between key metric changes and recent events at a glance. Simply select a timeframe between 10 minutes to 14 days to see if any major social events occurred within it and the effects that it had. 

*NOTE: Currently supports Discord announcements with other integrations coming soon.*

We are just getting started! Download today and get all the incredible updates that will be released soon that will help you navigate the complex NFT landscape effortlessly.
long.zh_TW:
透過 RΞLAY 讓你成為更精明的 NFT 交易者。RΞLAY 是個包含一系列功能的 NFT 智能購買工具，幫助你在 NFT 的領域升級。

以下是一些能讓你在交易 NFT 時獲勝的關鍵功能：

**NFT 項目分析**

地板價不是項目健康狀況的唯一指標，不過別擔心，我們已經幫你搞定。我們提供從 10 分鐘到 14 天的彈性時間框架，直觀地視覺化地板價、掛單數、成交數的波動。當你訪問 NFT 的項目頁面時，這些珍貴的洞察數據都會無時無刻伴隨著你，因此您可以毫不費力地得到這些重要數字。

**NFT 項目社群事件**

輕鬆關注 NFT 項目的社群事件，並一目了然地看出關鍵指標變化與最近事件之間的關係。只需選擇 10 分鐘到 14 天之間的時間範圍，即可查看其中是否發生了任何重要社群事件及產生的影響。

*註：目前支援 Discord 公告，其他社群整合即將推出。*

這些只是主要功能的快速概覽。前往我們的網站了解更多有關 RΞLAY 如何幫助你輕鬆駕馭複雜 NFT 環境的資訊。
